comments.body: Using doubles looks slightly strange but you follow the code around. I am fine with the changes.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +269,273 @@            case _: DayTimeIntervalType =>
              // Unbox and then cast
              Literal(lit.value.asInstanceOf[Long].toDouble)
            case DoubleType =>
              Multiply(lit, Literal(1000000.0))
